channel.title: Can anyone help?
channel.description: hey i just started moparscape and its freakin awsome!!! but anyway ive figured out how to do alot of things by just messin around and readin some posts. ive figured out how to get stuff and npcs and ive autospawned a kbd but everything that i spawn has no hitpoints and ive tried to change it in the "npc.cfg" thing but it still doesnt work so i was just wonderin how to make things spawn that have hp so i can kill it. thankz for you help!!

item.title: Can anyone help?
item.dc:creator: @helpmeplz helpmeplz
item.description:
@helpmeplz wrote:

can someone help me here im also new to this but i just cant figure out iv typed in atleast 50 severs that are stated online but there just not??? lol plz help guys

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone help?
item.dc:creator: @monsha monsha
item.description:
@monsha wrote:

adn the higher you set your npcs hit points the higher and stronger it hits e.g: set it to 1000 hp it could hit anywhere from 0 - 350 so set your npcs hp carefuly

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone help?
item.dc:creator: @Flying-Turtle-Assass Flying-Turtle-Assassin
item.description:
@Flying-Turtle-Assass wrote:

Ok, You have to open your npc.cfg folder in notepad so you can edit it. (right click, open with, notepad) Now you have that opend look on your right hand side and you will see Combat helath below that edit the numbers that say 0 to a health e.g 100. That will adjust there helath. Now Save the changes. if your running your server make sure you restart it To see your NPC.

Read full topic
